title: Africa: WHO Certifies Cabo Verde As Malaria-Free, Marking a Historic Milestone in the Fight Against Malaria
description: [WHO] The World Health Organization (WHO) has certified Cabo Verde as a malaria-free country, marking a significant achievement in global health. With this announcement, Cabo Verde joins the ranks of 43 countries and 1 territory that WHO has awarded this certification.

title: Africa: With No Check On Abuses, 'Civilians Bear the Brunt of Wartime Atrocities in the Horn of Africa' - HRW
description: [VOA] Nairobi, Kenya -- 2023 was a consequential year for human rights suppression and wartime atrocities, especially in the Horn of Africa, according to a new report by Human Rights Watch published Thursday. The rights group blames regional blocs and the international community for not doing enough to protect civilians.

title: Africa: In Numbers - TotalEnergies CAF AFCN
description: [CAF] The TotalEnergies CAF Africa Cup of Nations Cote d'Ivoire 2023 is days away from commencing.

title: Africa: South Africa Argues for Immediate Suspension of Israeli Attacks on Palestine
description: [IPS] Johannesburg -- Far from the mayhem, destruction, and humanitarian crisis in Gaza, the South African government argued in the International Court of Justice in the Hague that it had an obligation and a right to bring a case to halt a genocide by the Israeli government and its military.

title: Africa: Where Does the International Criminal Court Stand On Charges of Mass Killings in Gaza?
description: [IPS] United Nations -- The continued devastation of Gaza by Israel has triggered widespread charges of war crimes, genocide, forced displacement, ethnic cleansing, starvation as a weapon of war and mass killings of civilians - over 22,000 at last count--compared to 1,200 killings by Hamas.

title: Africa: Explainer - What Is the Genocide Convention?
description: [UN News] South Africa has set out its case accusing Israel of violating the Genocide Convention, pointing to the current situation in the bombarded, besieged Gaza Strip, home to 2.3 million Palestinians.

title: Africa: Long Covid - Damaged Mitochondria in Muscles Might Be Linked to Some of the Symptoms
description: [The Conversation Africa] It's estimated around 3% of people in the UK experience long COVID - persistent, long-lasting symptoms after a COVID-19 infection.

title: Africa: Life-Saving Aid Not Reaching Millions of People Caught in Health Emergencies - WHO
description: [VOA] Geneva -- The World Health Organization is warning that millions of people caught in conflict-driven health emergencies risk dying from traumatic wounds and infectious diseases because life-saving humanitarian aid is not reaching those in need.

title: Africa: African Catholic Bishops Reject Vatican's Same-Sex Blessings
description: [VOA] The Roman Catholic bishops of Africa and Madagascar on Thursday issued a statement refusing to follow Pope Francis' declaration permitting priests to offer blessings to same-sex couples.
